availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Vinsonhaller (Jefferson County, Kentucky, cabinet maker. )

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, cabinet maker. Virginia, native. Married to Mary Elizabeth Jean Vinsonhaller in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on February 28, 1839. Father of John Vinsonhaller, Katherine Vinsonhaller, Anna Vinsonhaller Shelton, George William Vinsonhaller, Sally Vinsonhaller, Carrie Vinsonhaller, and Mittie V. Vinsonhaller Cox. Cabinet maker in Jefferson County in 1850. Cabinet maker in Jefferson County in 1860.
